text: (And to recite the Qur'an) I am commanded to recite the Qur'an to you. (And whoso goeth right) whoever believes in what is in the Qur'an, (goeth right) believes (only for (the good of) his own soul) the reward of his faith goes to himself; (and as for him who goeth astray) disbelieves in the Qur'an ((Unto him) say) O Muhammad: (Lo! I am only a warner) I only warn you against the Fire by means of the Qur'an.
